isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 3200, 4100, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500, 8600 Models Built After 05/19/2003 - ENGINES - Caterpillar C10, C12 ENGINES - REMOTE ENGINE SPEED CONTROL MODULE (RESCM)

svcsubproc.title: Circuit Functions
svcsubproc.para: The I6 engine has optional feature codes that allow controlling the engine from a remote location outside the cab. This is accomplished by connecting to the discrete wiring of the engine ECM. When one of these feature codes, 012VVW (Provision for Remote Throttle Control) or 012VWY (Hydraulic Pressure Governor) is ordered, a harness pigtail with the engine control circuits is strapped to the engine harness.
Refer to Body Builder Manual CT-471 or the applicable engine manual for more details.
